resources.string: "Shaking while taking selfies of your poses with friends? Try using gestures to take selfies."
"Try swiping on the screen to quickly switch between the front and rear cameras."
"Want to capture moments quickly to not miss it? Try tapping the screen to focus and capture at once."
"Stuck with blurry photos? Try controlling the shutter speed, ISO, and focus."
"2... 1... Pose! Try taking multiple selfies in a row with different poses."
"Lost the remote again? Try using your phone as a remote and having it automatically show when home."
"Want to watch videos while surfing the web? Try using two apps at the same time on one screen."
"Knock, knock. Try knocking twice on the screen to turn it on or off."
"Made a typo? Try touching and holding the Space key to move the cursor."
"Try swiping up on any word suggestion to enter it."
"Try arranging or adding Home touch buttons in the way you want."
"Try safely backing up your content such as LG Home screen, settings, apps, and contacts to restore at a later time."
"Ring, ring. Who's calling? Try personalizing ringtones of incoming calls using their number."
Preview new features in OS upgrade.
